abstract: The reality-show contest to pick a new cast member for the popular show didn’t attract the audiences that Oxygen expected.
snippet: The reality-show contest to pick a new cast member for the popular show didn’t attract the audiences that Oxygen expected.
lead_paragraph: Executives at the Oxygen cable channel and the Bing search engine operated by Microsoft say they are pleased with the results of the Bing sponsorship of a new reality series, despite the show’s very rocky start in the ratings.

headline.main: Bing Considers Low-Rated ‘Glee Project’ a Success
